mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.seq AS "seq", a.behavior AS "behavior", a.law_basis AS "lawBasis", a.punish_type AS "punishType", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
